alert.note: Alert for Sandusky; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 9:19PM EDT until May 08 at 3:30AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Portage River At Woodville affecting Sandusky and Wood Counties. For the Portage River...including Woodville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Portage River At Woodville. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, The river inundates lower portions of Trail Marker Park and is out of banks in Pemberville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Friday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 9.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.7 feet on 03/13/1962. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning by 730 AM EDT.
